keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Every sentence in a 22-page document has been argued over, and an agreement that was expected to pass on Monday has been postponed.

headline.main: U.N. Deadlocked Over Draft Agreement on Refugees and Migrants
